explains: n. 暗示，提示；征兆，迹象；少许，少量；秘诀，窍门
wordGroup: a hint of 少许，一点点
hint at 暗示；对别人暗示…
take a hint 领会别人的暗示；接受暗示

sentences.en: She let fall a further heavy hint.
sentences.cn: 她似乎无意中又说出了一个明显的提示。

sentences.en: It was the barest hint of a smile.
sentences.cn: 那是一个几乎不露一丝痕迹的笑。

sentences.en: There was not a hint of badness in him.
